monogr.title: Dionysii Halicarnasei Antiquitatum Romanarum quae supersunt, Vol I
monogr.author: Dionysius of Halicarnassus

p.#text:
tou\s ei)wqo/tas a)podi/dosqai toi=s prooimi/ois tw=n
i(storiw=n lo/gous h(/kista boulo/menos a)nagka/zomai peri\
e)mautou= proeipei=n, ou)/t' e)n toi=s i)di/ois me/llwn pleona/zein
e)pai/nois, ou(\s e)paxqei=s oi)=da fainome/nous toi=s
a)kou/ousin, ou)/te diabola\s kaq' e(te/rwn e)gnwkw\s poiei=sqai 
suggrafe/wn, w(/sper *)anacime/nhs kai\ *qeo/pompos
e)n toi=s prooimi/ois tw=n i(storiw=n e)poi/hsan,
a)lla\ tou\s e)mautou= logismou\s a)podeiknu/menos, oi(=s
e)xrhsa/mhn o(/te e)pi\ tau/thn w(/rmhsa th\n pragmatei/an,
kai\ peri\ tw=n a)formw=n a)podidou\s lo/gon, e)c w(=n th\n 
e)mpeiri/an e)/labon tw=n grafhsome/nwn. e)pei/sqhn ga\r 
o(/ti dei= tou\s proairoume/nous mnhmei=a th=s e(autw=n yuxh=s
toi=s e)pigignome/nois katalipei=n, a(\ mh\ sunafanisqh/setai

toi=s sw/masin au)tw=n u(po\ tou= xro/nou, kai\
pa/ntwn ma/lista tou\s a)nagra/fontas i(stori/as, e)n ai(=s
kaqidru=sqai th\n a)lh/qeian  u(polamba/nomen
a)rxh\n fronh/sew/s te kai\ sofi/as ou)=san, prw=ton me\n
u(poqe/seis proairei=sqai kala\s kai\ megaloprepei=s kai\ 
pollh\n w)fe/leian toi=s a)nagnwsome/nois ferou/sas,
e)/peita paraskeua/zesqai ta\s e)pithdei/ous ei)s th\n
a)nagrafh\n th=s u(poqe/sews a)forma\s meta\ pollh=s e)pimelei/as
te kai\ filoponi/as. oi( me\n ga\r u(pe\r a)do/cwn
pragma/twn h)\ ponhrw=n h)\ mhdemia=s spoudh=s a)ci/wn
i(storika\s katabalo/menoi pragmatei/as, ei)/te tou= proelqei=n
ei)s gnw=sin o)rego/menoi kai\ tuxei=n o(poioudh/pote
o)no/matos, ei)/te periousi/an a)podei/casqai th=s
peri\ lo/gous duna/mews boulo/menoi, ou)/te th=s gnw/sews
zhlou=ntai para\ toi=s e)pigignome/nois ou)/te th=s duna/mews
e)painou=ntai, do/can e)gkatalipo/ntes toi=s a)nalamba/nousin
au)tw=n ta\s i(stori/as, o(/ti toiou/tous e)zh/lwsan
au)toi\ bi/ous, oi(/as e)ce/dwkan ta\s grafa/s: e)pieikw=s ga\r
a(/pantes nomi/zousin ei)ko/nas ei)=nai th=s e(ka/stou yuxh=s
 tou\s lo/gous. oi( de\ proairou/menoi me\n ta\s krati/stas
u(poqe/seis, ei)kh= de\ kai\ r(a|qu/mws au)ta\s suntiqe/ntes
e)k tw=n e)pituxo/ntwn a)kousma/twn, ou)de/na u(pe\r th=s 
proaire/sews e)/painon komi/zontai: ou) ga\r a)ciou=men
au)tosxedi/ous ou)de\ r(a|qu/mous ei)=nai ta\s peri/ te po/lewn
e)ndo/cwn kai\ a)ndrw=n e)n dunastei/a| gegono/twn a)nagrafome/nas
i(stori/as. tau=ta dh\ nomi/sas a)nagkai=a

kai\ prw=ta qewrh/mata toi=s i(storikoi=s ei)=nai kai\ pollh\n
poihsa/menos a)mfote/rwn e)pime/leian ou)/te parelqei=n
to\n u(pe\r au)tw=n lo/gon e)boulh/qhn, ou)/te e)n a)/llw|
tini\ to/pw| kataxwri/sai ma=llon h)\ tw=| prooimi/w| th=s
pragmatei/as.

th\n me\n ou)=n u(po/qesin o(/ti kalh\n ei)/lhfa kai\
megalopreph= kai\ polloi=s w)fe/limon ou) makrw=n oi)=mai
deh/sein lo/gwn toi=s ge dh\ mh\ panta/pasin a)pei/rws
e)/xousi th=s koinh=s i(stori/as. ei) ga/r tis e)pisth/sas th\n
dia/noian e)pi\ ta\s paradedome/nas e)k tou= parelhluqo/tos 
xro/nou po/lew/n te kai\ e)qnw=n h(gemoni/as, e)/peita
xwri\s e(ka/sthn skopw=n kai\ par' a)llh/las e)ceta/zwn
diagnw=nai boulhqei/h, ti/s au)tw=n a)rxh/n te megi/sthn
e)kth/sato kai\ pra/ceis a)pedei/cato lamprota/tas e)n ei)rh/nh|
te kai\ kata\ pole/mous, makrw=| dh/ tini th\n *(rwmai/wn 
h(gemoni/an a(pa/sas u(perbeblhme/nhn o)/yetai ta\s
pro\ au)th=s mnhmoneuome/nas, ou) mo/non kata\ to\ me/geqos
th=s a)rxh=s kai\ kata\ to\ ka/llos tw=n pra/cewn, a(\s
ou)/pw keko/smhke lo/gos ou)dei\s a)ci/ws, a)lla\ kai\ kata\
to\ mh=kos tou= perieilhfo/tos au)th\n xro/nou me/xri th=s 
kaq' h(ma=s h(liki/as. h( me\n ga\r *)assuri/wn a)rxh\ palaia/ 
tis ou)=sa kai\ ei)s tou\s muqikou\s a)nagome/nh xro/nous
o)li/gou tino\s e)kra/thse th=s *)asi/as me/rous. h( de\ *mhdikh\
kaqelou=sa th\n *)assuri/wn kai\ mei/zona dunastei/an
peribalome/nh xro/non ou) polu\n kate/sxen, a)ll' 
e)pi\ th=s teta/rths katelu/qh genea=s. *pe/rsai de\ oi(

*mh/dous katagwnisa/menoi th=s me\n *)asi/as o)li/gou dei=n
pa/shs teleutw=ntes e)kra/thsan, e)pixeirh/santes de\ kai\
toi=s *eu)rwpai/ois e)/qnesin ou) polla\ u(phga/gonto, xro/non
te ou) pollw=| plei/ona diakosi/wn e)tw=n e)/meinan e)pi\
 th=s a)rxh=s. h( de\ *makedonikh\ dunastei/a th\n *persw=n
kaqelou=sa i)sxu\n mege/qei me\n a)rxh=s a(pa/sas
u(pereba/leto ta\s pro\ au)th=s, xro/non de\ ou)de\ au(/th
polu\n h)/nqhsen, a)lla\ meta\ th\n *)aleca/ndrou teleuth\n
e)pi\ to\ xei=ron h)/rcato fe/resqai. diaspasqei=sa ga\r
ei)s pollou\s h(gemo/nas eu)qu\s a)po\ tw=n diado/xwn kai\ 
met' e)kei/nous a)/xri th=s deute/ras h)\ tri/ths i)sxu/sasa
proelqei=n genea=s, a)sqenh\s au)th\ di' e(auth=s e)ge/neto
kai\ teleutw=sa u(po\ *(rwmai/wn h)fani/sqh. kai\ ou)de\
au(/th me/ntoi pa=san e)poih/sato gh=n te kai\ qa/lassan
u(ph/koon: ou)/te ga\r *libu/hs o(/ti mh\ th=s pro\s *ai)gu/ptw|
ou) pollh=s ou)/shs e)kra/thsen, ou)/te th\n *eu)rw/phn
o(/lhn u(phga/geto, a)lla\ tw=n me\n borei/wn au)th=s merw=n
me/xri *qra/|khs proh=lqe, tw=n d' e(speri/wn me/xri th=s
*)adrianh=s kate/bh qala/sshs.

ai( me\n ou)=n e)pifane/statai tw=n pro/sqen h(gemoniw=n,
a(\s pareilh/famen e)k th=s i(stori/as, tosau/thn
a)kmh/n te kai\ i)sxu\n labou=sai katelu/qhsan: ta\s ga\r
*(ellhnika\s duna/meis ou)k a)/cion au)tai=s a)ntipareceta/zein,
ou)/te me/geqos a)rxh=s ou)/te xro/non e)pifanei/as

tosou=ton o(/son e)kei=nai labou/sas. *)aqhnai=oi me/n ge 
au)th=s mo/non h)=rcan th=s parali/ou duei=n de/onta e(bdomh/konta
e)/th kai\ ou)de\ tau/ths a(pa/shs, a)lla\ th=s e)nto\s
*eu)cei/nou te po/ntou kai\ tou= *pamfuli/ou pela/gous,
o(/te ma/lista e)qalassokra/toun. *lakedaimo/nioi de\ *peloponnh/sou 
kai\ th=s a)/llhs kratou=ntes *(ella/dos e(/ws
*makedoni/as th\n a)rxh\n prou)bi/basan, e)pau/sqhsan de\
u(po\ *qhbai/wn ou)de\ o(/la tria/konta e)/th th\n a)rxh\n katasxo/ntes.
h( de\ *(rwmai/wn po/lis a(pa/shs me\n a)/rxei 
gh=s o(/sh mh\ a)ne/mbato/s e)stin, a)ll' u(p' a)nqrw/pwn katoikei=tai, 
pa/shs de\ kratei= qala/sshs, ou) mo/non th=s
e)nto\s *(hraklei/wn sthlw=n, a)lla\ kai\ th=s *)wkeani/tidos
o(/sh plei=sqai mh\ a)du/nato/s e)sti, prw/th kai\ mo/nh tw=n
e)k tou= panto\s ai)w=nos mnhmoneuome/nwn a)natola\s kai\
du/seis o(/rous poihsame/nh th=s dunastei/as: xro/nos te 
au)th=| tou= kra/tous ou) braxu/s, a)ll' o(/sos ou)demia=| tw=n
a)/llwn ou)/te po/lewn ou)/te basileiw=n. eu)qu\s me\n ga\r 
e)c a)rxh=s meta\ to\n oi)kismo\n ta\ plhsi/on e)/qhn polla\
kai\ ma/xima o)/nta prosh/geto kai\ prou)/bainen a)ei\ pa=n
douloume/nh to\ a)nti/palon: tau=ta de\ pe/nte kai\ tettara/konta 
h)/dh pro\s  e(ptakosi/ois e)/tesi/n e)stin ei)s
u(pa/tous *klau/dion *ne/rwna to\ deu/teron 
kai\ *pei/swna *kalpou/rnion, oi(\ kata\ th\n tri/thn e)pi\
tai=s e)nenh/konta kai\ e(kato\n o)lumpia/sin a)pedei/xqhsan.

e)c ou(= de\ o(/lhs e)kra/thsen *)itali/as kai\ e)pi\ th\n a(pa/ntwn
e)qa/rrhsen a)rxh\n proelqei=n, e)kbalou=sa me\n e)k th=s
qala/tths *karxhdoni/ous, oi(\ plei/sthn e)/sxon nautikh\n
du/namin, u(poxei/rion de\ labou=sa *makedoni/an, h(\
te/ws e)do/kei me/giston i)sxu/ein kata\ gh=n, ou)de\n e)/ti
a)nti/palon e)/xousa ou)/te ba/rbaron fu=lon ou)/te *(ellhniko\n
genea\n e(bdo/mhn h)/dh th\n e)p' e)mou= diame/nei 
panto\s a)/rxousa to/pou: e)/qnos de\ ou)de\n w(s
ei)pei=n e)stin, o(\ peri\ th=s koinh=s h(gemoni/as h)\ tou= mh\
 a)/rxesqai pro\s au)th\n diafe/retai. a)lla\ ga\r o(/ti me\n
ou)/te th\n e)laxi/sthn tw=n u(poqe/sewn proh/|rhmai, kaqa/per
e)/fhn, ou)/te peri\ fau/las kai\ a)sh/mous pra/ceis
e)/gnwka diatri/bein, a)lla\ peri/ te po/lews gra/fw th=s
perifanesta/ths kai\ peri\ pra/cewn w(=n ou)k a)\n e)/xoi tis
e(te/ras e)pidei/casqai lamprote/ras, ou)k oi)=d' o(/,ti dei= plei/w le/gein.

o(/ti d' ou)k a)/neu logismou= kai\ pronoi/as e)/mfronos
e)pi\ ta\ palaia\ tw=n i(storoume/nwn peri\ au)th=s
e)trapo/mhn, a)ll' e)/xwn eu)logi/stous a)podou=nai th=s
proaire/sews ai)ti/as, o)li/ga bou/lomai proeipei=n, i(/na
mh/ tines e)pitimh/swsi/ moi tw=n pro\s a(/panta filaiti/wn,
ou)de/n pw tw=n mello/ntwn dhlou=sqai proakhkoo/tes,
o(/ti th=s a)oidi/mou genome/nhs kaq' h(ma=s po/lews a)do/cous 
kai\ pa/nu tapeina\s ta\s prw/tas a)forma\s labou/shs
kai\ ou)k a)ci/as i(storikh=s a)nagrafh=s, ou) pollai=s de\
geneai=s pro/teron ei)s e)pifa/neian kai\ do/can a)figme/nhs,

e)c ou(= ta/s te *makedonika\s kaqei=le dunastei/as
kai\ tou\s *foinikikou\s katw/rqwse pole/mous, e)co/n moi
tw=n e)ndo/cwn tina\ labei=n au)th=s u(poqe/sewn, e)pi\ th\n
ou)de\n e)/xousan e)pifane\s a)rxaiologi/an a)pe/klina. e)/ti 
ga\r a)gnoei=tai para\ toi=s *(/ellhsin o)li/gou dei=n pa=sin 
h( palaia\ th=s *(rwmai/wn po/lews i(stori/a, kai\ do/cai
tine\s ou)k a)lhqei=s, a)ll' e)k tw=n e)pituxo/ntwn a)kousma/twn
th\n a)rxh\n labou=sai tou\s pollou\s e)chpath/kasin,
w(s a)nesti/ous me/n tinas kai\ pla/nhtas kai\ barba/rous
kai\ ou)de\ tou/tous e)leuqe/rous oi)kista\s eu)xome/nhs, 
ou) di' eu)se/beian de\ kai\ dikaiosu/nhn kai\ th\n
a)/llhn a)reth\n e)pi\ th\n a(pa/ntwn h(gemoni/an su\n xro/nw|
parelqou/shs, a)lla\ di' au)tomatismo/n tina kai\ tu/xhn
a)/dikon ei)kh= dwroume/nhn ta\ me/gista tw=n a)gaqw=n
toi=s a)nepithdeiota/tois: kai\ oi(/ ge kakohqe/steroi kathgorei=n 
ei)w/qasi th=s tu/xhs kata\ to\ fanero\n w(s barba/rwn
toi=s ponhrota/tois ta\ tw=n *(ellh/nwn porizome/nhs
a)gaqa/. kai\ ti/ dei= peri\ tw=n a)/llwn le/gein, o(/pou 
ge kai\ tw=n suggrafe/wn tine\s e)to/lmhsan e)n tai=s i(stori/ais
tau=ta gra/yantes katalipei=n, basileu=si barba/rois 
misou=si th\n h(gemoni/an, oi(=s douleu/ontes au)toi\
kai\ ta\ kaq' h(dona\s o(milou=ntes diete/lesen, ou)/te dikai/as
ou)/te a)lhqei=s i(stori/as xarizo/menoi;

tau/tas dh\ ta\s peplanhme/nas, w(/sper e)/fhn,
u(polh/yeis e)cele/sqai th=s dianoi/as tw=n pollw=n proairou/menos
kai\ a)ntikataskeua/sai ta\s a)lhqei=s, peri\
me\n tw=n oi)kisa/ntwn th\n po/lin, oi(/tines h)=san kai\ kata\
ti/nas e(/kastoi kairou\s sunh=lqon kai\ ti/si tu/xais xrhsa/menoi
ta\s patri/ous oi)kh/seis e)ce/lipon, e)n tau/th|
dhlw/sw th=| grafh=|, di' h(=s *(/ellhna/s te au)tou\s o)/ntas 
e)pidei/cein u(pisxnou=mai kai\ ou)k e)k tw=n e)laxi/stwn h)\
faulota/twn e)qnw=n sunelhluqo/tas. peri\ de\ tw=n pra/cewn,
a(\s meta\ to\n oi)kismo\n eu)qe/ws a)pedei/canto, kai\
peri\ tw=n e)pithdeuma/twn, e)c w(=n ei)s tosau/thn h(gemoni/an
proh=lqon oi( met' au)tou\s, a)po\ th=s meta\ tau/thn
a)rca/menos a)nagrafh=s a)fhgh/somai, paralipw\n ou)de\n
o(/sh moi du/namis tw=n a)ci/wn i(stori/as, i(/na toi=s
ge maqou=si th\n a)lh/qeian a(\ prosh/kei peri\ th=s po/lews
th=sde parasth=| fronei=n, ei) mh\ panta/pasin a)gri/ws kai\
dusmenw=s dia/keintai pro\s au)th/n, kai\ mh/te a)/xqesqai
th=| u(pota/cei kata\ to\ ei)ko\s genome/nh| fu/sews ga\r dh\
no/mos a(/pasi koino/s, o(\n ou)dei\s katalu/sei xro/nos, a)/rxein
a)ei\ tw=n h(tto/nwn tou\s krei/ttonas' mh/te kathgorei=n
th=s tu/xhs, w(s ou)k e)pithdei/w| po/lei thlikau/thn
h(gemoni/an kai\ tosou=ton h)/dh xro/non proi=ka dwrhsame/nhs:
maqou=si/ ge dh\ para\ th=s i(stori/as, o(/ti muri/as
h)/negken a)ndrw=n a)reta\s eu)qu\s e)c a)rxh=s meta\ to\n oi)kismo\n,

w(=n ou)/t' eu)sebeste/rous ou)/te dikaiote/rous
ou)/te swfrosu/nh| plei/oni para\ pa/nta to\n bi/on xrhsame/nous
ou)de/ ge ta\ pole/mia krei/ttous a)gwnista\s
ou)demi/a po/lis h)/negken ou)/te *(ella\s ou)/te ba/rbaros,
ei) dh\ a)pe/stai tou= lo/gou to\ e)pi/fqonon: e)/xei ga/r 
ti kai\ toiou=ton h( tw=n parado/cwn kai\ qaumastw=n
u(po/sxesis. oi( de\ su/mpantes oi( tosou=to periqe/ntes 
au)th=| dunastei/as me/geqos a)gnoou=ntai pro\s *(ellh/nwn,
ou) tuxo/ntes a)ciolo/gou suggrafe/ws: ou)demi/a
ga\r a)kribh\s e)celh/luqe peri\ au)tw=n *(ellhni\s i(stori/a 
me/xri tw=n kaq' h(ma=s xro/nwn, o(/ti mh\ kefalaiw/deis
e)pitomai\ pa/nu braxei=ai,

prw/tou me\n, o(/sa ka)me\ ei)de/nai, th\n *(rwmai+kh\n
a)rxaiologi/an e)pidramo/ntos *(ierwno/mou tou= *kardianou=
suggrafe/ws e)n th=| peri\ tw=n e)pigo/nwn pragmatei/a|: 
e)/peita *timai/ou tou= *sikeliw/tou ta\ me\n a)rxai=a
tw=n i(storiw=n e)n tai=s koinai=s i(stori/ais a)fhghsame/nou,
tou\s de\ pro\s *pu/rron to\n *)hpeirw/thn pole/mous
ei)s i)di/an kataxwri/santos pragmatei/an: a(/ma de\
tou/tois *)antigo/nou te kai\ *polubi/ou kai\ *silhnou= kai\ 
muri/wn a)/llwn toi=s au)toi=s pra/gmasin ou)x o(moi/ws
e)pibalo/ntwn, w(=n e(/kastos o)li/ga kai\ ou)de\ a)kribw=s
au)tw=| diespoudasme/na, a)ll' e)k tw=n e)pituxo/ntwn
a)kousma/twn sunqei\s a)ne/grayen. o(moi/as de\ tou/tois 

kai\ ou)de\n diafo/rous e)ce/dwkan i(stori/as kai\ *(rwmai/wn
o(/soi ta\ palaia\ e)/rga th=s po/lews *(ellhnikh=|
diale/ktw| sune/grayan, w(=n ei)si presbu/tatoi *ko/into/s te
*fa/bios kai\ *leu/kios *ki/gkios, a)mfo/teroi kata\ tou\s
*foinikikou\s a)kma/santes pole/mous. tou/twn de\ tw=n
a)ndrw=n e(ka/teros, oi(=s me\n au)to\s e)/rgois parege/neto,
dia\ th\n e)mpeiri/an a)kribw=s a)ne/graye, ta\ de\ a)rxai=a
ta\ meta\ th\n kti/sin th=s po/lews geno/mena kefalaiwdw=s
e)pe/dramen. dia\ tau/tas me\n dh\ ta\s ai)ti/as e)/doce/
moi mh\ parelqei=n kalh\n i(stori/an e)gkataleifqei=san
u(po\ tw=n presbute/rwn a)mnhmo/neuton, e)c h(=s a)kribw=s
grafei/shs sumbh/setai ta\ kra/tista kai\ dikaio/tata
tw=n e)/rgwn: toi=s me\n e)kpeplhrwko/si th\n e(autw=n
moi=ran a)ndra/sin a)gaqoi=s do/chs ai)wni/ou tuxei=n kai\ 
pro\s tw=n e)pigignome/nwn e)painei=sqai, a(/ poiei= th\n
qnhth\n fu/sin o(moiou=sqai th=| qei/a| kai\ mh\ sunapoqnh/skein
 ta\ e)/rga toi=s sw/masi: toi=s de\ a)p' e)kei/nwn
tw=n i)soqe/wn a)ndrw=n nu=n te oi)=si kai\ u(/steron
e)some/nois mh\ to\n h(/disto/n te kai\ r(a=|ston ai(rei=sqai
tw=n bi/wn, a)lla\ to\n eu)gene/staton kai\ filotimo/taton,
e)nqumoume/nous o(/ti tou\s ei)lhfo/tas kala\s ta\s prw/tas
e)k tou= ge/nous a)forma\s me/ga e)f' e(autoi=s prosh/kei
fronei=n kai\ mhde\n a)na/cion e)pithdeu/ein tw=n progo/nwn:
e)moi\ de\, o(\s ou)xi\ kolakei/as xa/rin e)pi\ tau/thn

a)pe/klina th\n pragmatei/an, a)lla\ th=s a)lhqei/as kai\
tou= dikai/ou pronoou/menos, w(=n dei= stoxa/zesqai pa=san
i(stori/an, prw=ton me\n e)pidei/casqai th\n e)mautou= dia/noian,
o(/ti xrhsth\ pro\s a(/pantas  e)sti\ tou\s
a)gaqou\s kai\ filoqew/rous tw=n kalw=n e)/rgwn kai\ mega/lwn: 
e)/peita xaristhri/ous a)moiba/s, a(\s e)moi\ du/namis
